title: I need help ! ! !
body:
After patch 7.4 i cant play lol.....

I start the game 

Get into champ slelect 

Game starts 

Loading sceen 

IT came about 50% and crash 

I try to reconnect but it dosent work

replies.body: I want to help!  When you say crash, what do you mean exactly?  Are you getting any error messages like a bugsplat, and what does it say?
